page.title: 15Pastimes in Hemsworth 5
page.content: {Breakdaancin' On the streets today you will see 'Breakdancin'. If it's done properly you will see 'popin' 'spinin' and all the rest. Dancers have their own language; words such as 'bad' meaning very good and 'buggin out' meaning going like crazy. Dancers usually wear Nike, Adidas or Fila clothes, and footwear is important for walking on your toes - 'floatin'. 'Breakin' started about 7 years ago in The Bronx, an area of New York, where gangs fought each other. People were sometimes killed and so another solution was sought, this was 'Breakdancin'. Even in Yorkshire 'battles' are fought between different teams.
